type: Landscaping, Grounds Maintenance and Snow Removal
description: Providing Landscaping, Grounds Maintenance and Snow Removal
full_summary:
### Landscaping, Grounds Maintenance and Snow Removal at WPG1 and WPG2
#### Request for Proposal
#### Solicitation Number: 23-58049
#### Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) eligible

**Description:**
The National Research Council Canada seeks a contractor to provide landscaping, grounds maintenance, and snow removal services at its building grounds in Winnipeg, Manitoba (WPG1 and WPG2). The selected contractor will be responsible for maintaining the grounds in accordance with the detailed Statement of Work attached as Annex "A".

**Key Requirements:**
* Provide landscaping, grounds maintenance, and snow removal services at WPG1 and WPG2
* Maintain the grounds in accordance with the detailed Statement of Work attached as Annex "A"
* Ensure compliance with all relevant laws, regulations, and Canadian standards

**Timeline:**
* Expected contract start date: November 1, 2023
* Expected contract end date: March 31, 2025

**Eligibility:**
This tender is open to any contractor meeting the eligibility criteria. The selection process will be based on variations or combinations of the methods outlined in the RFP.

**Submission:**
Proposals must be submitted electronically in accordance with the instructions outlined in the RFP.

**Deadline:** 
September 8, 2023 at 14:00:00 (local time)

**Contracting Entity:**
National Research Council Canada

**Contact:**
Stephane Lajoie
Phone: (514) 210-7395
Email: [stephane.lajoie@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca](mailto:stephane.lajoie@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca)
Address:
435 Ellice Avenue, Bldgs. WPG1 and WPG2
Winnipeg, Manitoba R3B 1Y6
Canada
